entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
